    Class
    Description
    CommandParamsException
    Thrown out if command arguments are invalid or missing.
    FileAccessException
    Thrown out on file access error.
    FileDoesNotExist
    Discarded if the file does not exist.
    InvalidArgumentsLimitsException
    Discarded when arguments are received that are out of bounds.
    RecursionLimitException
    Thrown out when script execution recursion depth is exceeded.
